title: Frank Lloyd Wright Saguaro Hoop Earring—Blue/Green
description:
Want style in spades? You're in the Wright place. These laser cut stainless steel and concrete earrings are inspired by Saguaro Forms and Cactus Flowers, a design Frank Lloyd Wright® (American, 1867–1959) created for an unpublished Liberty Magazine cover in 1927. Rubber earring backs included. Made in the USA. Colors may vary in intensity. 

1 3/8 in.
